intro: Arnicastrum, commonly known as the "spearwort," is a genus of flowering plants in the family Polygonaceae. Arnicastrum species are native to temperate regions of Europe, Asia, and North America, and they often thrive in moist, well-drained soils. These plants are valued for their ornamental appeal and have been used in traditional herbal medicine for their purported anti-inflammatory properties.
